name: Chuugoku Janshi Story: Tonfuu
overview:
Chuugoku Janshi Story: Tonfuu ("Chinese Mahjong Story: East Wind") is a mahjong game for the Famicom released by ZAP and Natsume.

It is a two-player variant of mahjong, where the human player competes with a CPU opponent in a series of single games. Chuugoku Janshi Story is set up as a tournament, where players have to win several games in a row to be crowned victor.
